import React, { Component } from 'react' import {Label, Rating, Image, Card, Modal, Header, Button, Icon, Popup } from 'semantic-ui-react' export class BookCard extends Component { handleClick = () => { this.props.onFavoriteBook(this.props.book) } render() { return ( {this.props.book.volumeInfo.title} {this.props.book.volumeInfo.authors} }>

{this.props.book.volumeInfo.description}

) } } export default BookCard
